title: [Plum pudding: a collection of 8 short animated films]
creator_contributor_role: Newton Creative Arts Center, production company
genre: Amateur & Student Films/Student films - United States
abstract: Eden (dir. Amy Kravitz)--The Short cut (dir. Rebecca Snider)--Picnic (dir. Barbara Bikofsky)--Plague (dir. Amy Schwarz) --Coffin child (dir. Mark Winer)--Magic mushroom (dir. Karen Warsehaver)--Hair (dir. Ellen Ricastein)--Bomb (dir. Sonya)
description: This collection of short animated films directed by eight film students at the Newton Creative Arts Center shows a diverse range of issues that are laced to motivate and for showing students' achievements. This creative media allows a mixture of students to experiment with film and animation.
